snippet: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission charged a futures firm and its chief with fraud after nearly $200 million in customer funds went missing.
abstract: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission charged a futures firm and its chief with fraud after nearly $200 million in customer funds went missing.

headline.main: Regulators Charge Futures Brokerage Firm and Chief With Fraud
headline.print_headline: Regulators Charge a Futures Brokerage Firm and Its Chief With Fraud
